Franchise Directory
Top 25 Franchises
Big Opportunities Home > Franchise Categories > Food Franchises Food Franchises Franchises&Business Opportunities
Looking for a specific food franchises franchise? Narrow your search: Sandwich Delis | BBQ | Fast Food | Soup&Salad | Candy | Breakfast, Donuts&Bagels | Hamburger | Pizza | Wraps | Seafood | Chicken | Wings | Ice Cream/Frozen Yogurt The food services industry is the franchising community's most visible segment. Restaurants employ an estimated 12.8 million people in the U.S. alone, and women and minorities are strongly represented in this sector. This vast industry offers a wide range of franchises for sale. Some require food industry experience while many do not require any previous experience at all. Your choices in this high-demand franchise category include fast food franchises, pizza franchises, sub sandwich and deli franchises, wing franchises, burger franchises, barbeque (BBQ) franchises, bagel franchises, Mexican food franchises, wraps franchises, smoothie franchises, ice cream and frozen yogurt franchises, cookie franchises, candy franchises and bakery franchises. Browse our food franchises for sale and keep your community well fed while taking control of your career. Sort by: Company Name Cash Required 1. Happy's Pizza Cash Required $150,000 Capitalize on the popular fast casual dining and pizza industries when you own a Happy's Pizza franchise. 2. Subway Cash Required $50,000 Own a top-ranked, award-winning franchise. Benefit from low start-up costs, an easy-to-operate business system and strong support. 3. Kona Ice Cash Required $20,000 - $30,000 Over 400% GROWTH during RECESSION. The KONA Company is putting fun back on the streets. Amazing Margins, Protected Territories, Multi-Unit Potential 4. Wings Etc. Cash Required $150,000 Serve the best wings in the booming food service industry and enjoy a built-in fan base when you own a Wings, Etc. Restaurant&Pub. 5. Maui Wowi Hawaiian Coffees&Smoothies Cash Required $65,000 Hawaiian Coffees and Smoothies - The Best of Both Worlds! 6. Coffee Beanery Cash Required $50,000 - $150,000 Coffee may be common, but should never be ordinary! At the Coffee Beanery, we're providing opportunities in one of the fastest growing franchise markets today. The Speciality Coffee Industry! Domes... 7. Sobik's Subs Franchising Cash Required $35,000 No experience needed to own a Sobik's Subs franchise for as little as $59K. Capitalize on Sobik's more than 40 years of experience in the submarine sandwich shop industry. 8. Doc Popcorn Cash Required $70,000 Doc Popcorn - A Fun, Unique, Food Franchise Opportunity 9. Nestlé Toll House Café by Chip Cash Required $100,000 Nestlé Toll House Café by Chip is the only major, national dessert café that features top-quality branded cookies, baked goods, coffee, ice cream and smoothies. Nestlé products offer strong brand reco... 10. 7-Eleven, Inc. Cash Required $70,000 7-Eleven stores focus on meeting the needs of convenience-oriented customers by providing a broad selection of fresh, high quality products and services at everyday prices. 11. Little Caesars Enterprises Cash Required $50,000 Little Caesars is growing in prime markets across the country, and offers franchisee candidates an opportunity for independence with a proven system. 12. GoWaiter Inc Cash Required $20,000 - $50,000 Own a unique, high-demand business opportunity that provides consumers a much needed service. No experience needed. 13. Souper Salad Cash Required $200,000 Start out with success - join one of the leading brands in the healthy food franchise category. This is the first time Souper Salad is seeking franchise owners. 14. Saladworks Cash Required $75,000 - $200,000 Own the Nation's #1 Salad Franchise and provide a fully customizable and calorie conscious menu as an alternative food offering for people on the go in your preferred geography. 15. Quizno's Cash Required $70,000 Its faster, easier and more affordable than ever to own a Quiznos. Leverage a beloved brand. Join a leader in the $566 billion restaurant industry. 16. YoFresh Cash Required $50,000 Enter the growing natural food industry with a YoFresh franchise and never pay royalty fees. 17. Wok Box Cash Required $100,000 Wok Box Fresh Asian Kitchen has put together a delicious variety of flavorful and healthy meal choices from popular Asian regions all in one menu. Our lunch and dinner selections are made to order wit... Opportunities You Should Know About: Minuteman Press
Join the top-ranked printing franchise. Benefit from owning a franchise that counts every business as a potential client. DVDNow Kiosks, Inc.
